channel.title: Connection problem
channel.description:
I'm trying to host my server on Linux (Debian) everything works, but when i try to Log In to my server I can only see a Black screen and Connection Lost then. Cmd says:
[CODE]Server is now online. [Amfibija] Connected [Amfibija] Connected [Amfibija] Disconnected Broken pipe [Amfibija] Connected Null Disconnected (88-222-181-45.meganet.lt) null null null[/CODE]
